description_en: price tiers and luxury levels for bridal and formal wear.
description_zh: 婚纱与正式礼服价格档与奢华程度。

attributes.description_en: Affordable price range, typically under $500, suitable for budget-conscious shoppers.
attributes.description_zh: 实惠价格范围，通常在500美元以下，适合预算有限的购物者。

attributes.description_en: Moderate price range, typically $500-$2000, offering good value and quality.
attributes.description_zh: 中等价格范围，通常500-2000美元，提供良好价值和质量。

attributes.description_en: Premium price range, typically $2000-$5000, offering luxury and exclusivity.
attributes.description_zh: 高端价格范围，通常2000-5000美元，提供奢华和独特性。

attributes.description_en: Ultra-premium price range, typically $5000-$10000, offering exceptional quality and craftsmanship.
attributes.description_zh: 超高端价格范围，通常5000-10000美元，提供卓越质量和工艺。

attributes.description_en: Ultra-luxury price range, typically $10000+, offering one-of-a-kind pieces and exceptional craftsmanship.
attributes.description_zh: 超奢华价格范围，通常10000美元以上，提供独一无二单品和卓越工艺。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with uneven or off-center design elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有不均匀或偏心设计元素的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with sheer fabric or mesh overlay.
attributes.description_zh: 带有透明面料或网纱覆盖的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with decorative cutouts or openings.
attributes.description_zh: 带有装饰性镂空或开口的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with soft, draped fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有柔软垂坠面料的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with multiple layers or tiers.
attributes.description_zh: 带有多层或分层的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with gathered or pleated fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有收褶或打褶面料的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers with belt or sash elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有腰带或饰带元素的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers that wrap around the body.
Price tiers with short overskirt or ruffle elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有短罩裙或荷叶边元素的价格档。

attributes.description_en: Clean, simple price tiers with minimal details.
attributes.description_zh: 简洁干净的价格档，细节最少。

attributes.description_en: Structured, geometric price tiers with sharp lines.
attributes.description_zh: 结构化几何价格档，线条锐利。

attributes.description_en: Non-traditional price tiers with unconventional construction.
attributes.description_zh: 非传统价格档，带有非常规结构。

attributes.description_en: One-of-a-kind price tiers created through advanced techniques.
attributes.description_zh: 通过高级技术创造的独一无二价格档。

attributes.description_en: Price tiers that can be altered or adjusted.
attributes.description_zh: 可改变或调整的价格档。
